name: DISHA FOUNDATION
briefDescription: As an institution, our major activities cover:-  Special Education -  Educating nearly 150 special children.-  Teachers Training-  training teachers for this field, officially recognized by      Rehabilitation Council of India.  -  Vocational Training - training children for earning jobs.-  Home Management  - training parents to handle their children, officially   recognized by National Trust.-  Physiotherapy-   giving motion training to children.-  Speech Therapy - children suffering from multiple disabilities need speech  therapy  - Research-  building data for advocacy, opening more such  institutions.
